api_list.name: Get MP3
api_list.description: Convert to MP3 at the default bit rate. Quota cost will apply according to the length of the mp3 file.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: YouTube video ID. Quota cost is calculated based on the length of the mp3 file: 1 for length <= 30 seconds, 2 for 30 < length <= 60 seconds, 3 for 60 < length <= 90 seconds, 4 for 90 < length <= 120 seconds, 5 for 120 < length <= 150 seconds, and 6 for 150 < length <= 180 seconds.

optional_parameters.name: cut
optional_parameters.description: Cut the mp3 according to the provided sStart and sEnd parameters. The value must be provided as 1. The quota cost is +1.

optional_parameters.name: sStart
optional_parameters.description: Starting point for cutting the mp3. Format must be HH:MM:SS.

optional_parameters.name: sEnd
optional_parameters.description: End point for cutting the mp3. Format must be HH:MM:SS.
